description: This portable 80GB external hard drive is designed for mobile users demanding quality and style. Patented built-in USB cable eliminates the hassle of having to carry power adapter or data cable. Supple fine grain leather will please your senses and impress those of others. Portable luxury – for those who won’t settle for less! FEATURES : Integrated USB cable (no messy wires), USB powered (no bulky AC adapters), Supple fine grain leather, Preformatted NTFS, Plug-n-play ready. SPECIFICATION : Type: External hard drive, Form Factor: 2.5", Hard Drive: 80GB (5400RPM 8MB cache), Internal Interface: SATA I/II, External Interface: Hi-speed USB 2.0, Data Transfer Rate: 480Mbps, Power Source: USB powered, Power Input: 5V DC, Certification: FCC, CE Certified and RoHS compliant, O.S. Required: Win98SE/ME/2000/XP/Vista Mac OS 9.0 or higher Linux, Dimension: 5.4 x 3.0 x 0.48 inch, Weight: 0.7 lbs
title: Consus CS280BSU2-BK 80GB Portable External Hard Drive
